website_summaries.verdict: From stylish looks to top-notch quality to versatile wear, this Michael Kors watch has it all, and is a good pick for enthusiasts of the brand who want a timeless style.
pros: Generates praise for the two-tone stainless-steel workmanship that goes well with other accessories and numerous fashions
Blue chronograph dial with date window and three subdials
Has a substantial, well-made feel on the wrist
cons: Rare reports of losing a few minutes of time here and there

customer_reviews.title: At first i was shock of how big it looks but then i realized how beautiful it looks on
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have!! At first i was shock of how big it looks but then i realized how beautiful it looks on! Worth every dollar... elegant and stunning watch, MK my favorite!!
customer_reviews.author: Mirna Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, this is a beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: My old watch was all dinged up and in need of replacement. This is my first chornograph and I really like the stopwatch features (found the MK warranty manual online with the instructions). Love the look and feel, removed a few links and now the fit is perfect. Great buy and a good value. I definitely recommend this. If you don't see any updates to this review in the future you'll know I haven't had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Verma

customer_reviews.title: Love My Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my MK watch first time having a white/pearl face, but it’s beautiful it really pops, I’ve always loved the larger face on watches for me so this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Martinez

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: IF Your the type of person that enjoys getting what your hard earn Money pays for, then you will be Disappointed Because the watch is not going to come to you as shown in the photo. the watch in the photo has a beautiful BLUE Face, what you will received will not be BLUE it will be a dark purple Face. which in my option is not what i paid for or ordered. The watch it self is Very Nice and Elegant and I am not taking anything from the overall Watch it self. but for me...I wanted a Blue face and that is not what arrived at my door.
customer_reviews.author: Humble King

customer_reviews.title: And a great option for a more original look other than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! And a great option for a more original look other than the rose gold that everyone wears.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Black Kors watch
customer_reviews.text: Michael Kors has the ultimate fashion watches. I've had an all-white, ceramic Kors watch for 5 years. Love it to death, but I was looking for a change. The stark contrast to my white watch is this all-black one. It's painted stainless steel, mostly shiny (Darth Vader watch!). It looks expensive and has some weight to it. Love it so far, will update after months of wear :)
customer_reviews.author: ClaireQ

customer_reviews.title: Gold wearing off watch
customer_reviews.text: I paid too much money for the gold to be wearing off this watch only a few months after purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica V

customer_reviews.title: Uniqueness
customer_reviews.text: This watch goes with everything I think. Gold & silver both look fine with it. It's color reminds me of bronze satin material. It has a different look in different lighting. I've had many compliments on it. It is 40 mm which is not the largest (43mm). 35 mm is a more common size. I absolutely love it!! Of my many MK watches, this is my favorite now. I've only bought his watches for the last 10 yrs bc they can handle my abuse. I don't mean to be rough, it just happens. My first one lasted two years before the face even scratched.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: This is my first Gold plated MK watch and I am in love. My favorite colour is black so I figured ...
customer_reviews.text: So this watch is quite large. Definitely a big faced. I have somewhat skinny wrist but thick arms so I had to have 3 of the links removed at a local jeweler ($5.00). As far as authenticity goes it is real. I have other MK watches that I have purchased from B--k's and so I had a guide basically to determine the authenticity. This is my first Gold plated MK watch and I am in love. My favorite colour is black so I figured I would try this just to see what the gold on black would look like and I am not disappointed at all!
customer_reviews.author: MedSchool

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch it's a bit on the heavy side the color gold and pink looks very elegant and it's the size I was looking for I have to get the bands adjusted and found out you can take it to any Michael Kors or fossil store and they will adjust the band to your size for free. I gave it a four star due to the fact it's heavy but overall it's very beautiful can't wait to rock it. I put a quarter on top of the watch so you can see how big the face is
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Men's Watch
customer_reviews.text: I needed a women's watch, specifically black on black color, and got a men's watch. I read reviews before I ordered and women were mentioning having to take links out. I thought this was odd but still ordered. Received watch, it was very nice but very heavy, loose and spun around my wrist. Clearly a men's watch even though my order history confirms i ordered a women watch. Sent back. Also seems as if description has been corrected since I've ordered but my link for womens watch from my history still brings me to this men's page. Back on my hunt for a casual but nice all black watch.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Heavy enough to be used for a murder weapon
customer_reviews.text: I bought a tv the same day this watch was delivered. I am fairly sure the tv weighs less. This watch is entirely too heavy to be comfortable, certainly too heavy to put on and forget about.... I bought this after seeing someone's MK smartwatch, the colors were gorgeous but I didnt want/need a smartwatch . I was hoping for similiar 2 to be colors..it is not. This is yellow goldtone w/rosegold...not crazy about the look or the weight.
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is quite nice, but the size advertised is not correct. It says the face diameter is 43mm when it is really about 36. It also states the the band width is 22mm and it is closer to 16mm. To me it's not that much of an "oversized" watch compared to what I thought I was getting. I have to decide now if I want to keep it or not. I wanted something more like it was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerfield_BG

customer_reviews.title: I'm absolutely in love with this watch
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely in love with this watch. I'm female mind you and I bought the men's watch. It's very good quality and heavy, I don't recommend this item if you don't want the weight on your wrist. I took it to a MICHEAL KORS store to have a few links taken off for free, it's beautiful and I get a lot of compliments on it! I received this watch it two days and it's well worth the price. I highly recommend this whether you're a man or woman. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lone Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the color - looks like chocolate satin with rose ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly elegant boyfriend watch! Absolutely love the color - looks like chocolate satin with rose gold numbers and hands. Just in love with this watch!!
customer_reviews.author: EAV

customer_reviews.title: BIG and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! The quality was perfect looks and feels 100% authentic. It was packaged great and had no scratches on it. However... the face of this watch is very big 43mm to be exact. I have a small wrist so I need to get used to it. Kinda torn if I should return or keep it because I really do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lolascorpion

customer_reviews.title: it looked great and even petite
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my girlfriend. She loves it! Not sure why the current picture displays a black faced watch, but the watch I wanted and orders has a navy blue face. It is a deep navy blue which sometimes looks black or green in certain lighting. This makes it, surprisingly, more versatile for complimenting her outfits. The only con (not really a con) was that the band was too big, which made it look way over-sized...but once we got it refitted by removing a few of the links, it looked great and even petite, yet large faced...which gave it that "boyfriend's watch" look. Anyways, she wears it all the time which makes both of us happy!
customer_reviews.author: Monique & Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Classy, weighty, durable, and a beautiful statement for a professional. Love it and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is actually Michael Kors. I had issues with my package and quality control took care of it immediately. I'm very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Roman Svengali

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, arrived quickly, very nicely packed, great watch but if you're a gal and like small ladies type I suggest you get another smaller the one has bigger dial, but nice, I had to remove 4 links so that it would fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresita

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch....one plastic problem
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Its a beautiful watch. I believe its Unisex though because its rather thick even as a "boyfriend watch" style. The only complaint which is rather minor is that the watch comes already working, so the battery died within a month meaning this watch had been sitting down somewhere in storage ticking away. A little piece of plastic stop that you find with other watches goes a long way (although other models of MK watches i have bought for her did come with it i believe.
customer_reviews.author: Just Your Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this watch. I had my eye on it for months before buying it. It's boyfriend style so it's heavier but it looks great with everything. If you want a more accurate picture for the gold coloring check out Macy's or herberger's. The gold isn't as yellow as this photo shows, it's much prettier in person. The settings are easy to get used to and getting it sized is simple. Macy's won't size watches if you don't buy through them though so I'd go to a watch place or a jewelry store.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beutiful watch!!! It is large compared to most women watches and it has some weight to it as well. I just love it
customer_reviews.author: driss zine

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed! Buy it :)
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch for any collector! Definitely authentic and definitely a man's watch but I love oversized watches so this isn't an issue for me. Highly recommend and for the price it's a steal, take advantage! Update: I've had my watch now for 5 months and it's still just like it came out of the box! No rub marks or discoloration at all and I wear it daily (on the non writing wrist) TONS of compliments. It's in the top 3 fav of my collection ❤
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Navarre

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: The photo doesn’t capture the rose gold but you need to trust me, its stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Kobeluna71

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for getting this to us by Christmas!!!! Original delivery said not until Saturday but it got here early. It’s beautiful, my daughter loves it and it was here under the tree this morning. Thank you again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K Kope

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, not for all tastes
customer_reviews.text: The watch is as expected based on what I saw and read online prior to buying it. I like the color combination and the price, it may feel lighter in weight than what I had imagined, especially that it's a 43mm diameter case. The big case is what attracted me to it, also the good discounted price, but overall I am not thrilled with the watch, the bracelet feels not as sturdy. I am considering returning it, but that's just personal taste after all.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful large watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. I really like how it looks on my wrist. Although I have a very small arm and wrist size, it looks great. I did have to have several links removed to have it fit properly it was worth it. I’m looking forward to wearing it in style.
customer_reviews.author: gemgirl

customer_reviews.title: 6 months and watch no longer works.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch back in September, 2018 and here it is 6 months later the watch no longer works properly. Very upset that this watch has only lasted me 6 months to be exact.
customer_reviews.author: mbph2001

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch back in November as a gift for my boyfriend and it came as the description says. Unfortunately it was stolen while we were on vacation and now I am trying to replace it but when I recieved it it was not as the description says nor was it the same as the previous one i had gotten the watch gace is purple not navy blue i have exchanged it and today recieved another purple faced watch i am very disappointed and now have to try to findnine that is similar to the one i had gotten him in November.
customer_reviews.author: raianna

customer_reviews.title: feels fake
customer_reviews.text: I got the teal, the band just looks like it was dipped in paint (I have bought other MK watches with color metal bands and they do not have that feel), Also really difficult to adjust the band (the paint started peeling) and some of the links got stuck. Can't return now, but definitely not happy.
customer_reviews.author: amzon costumer

customer_reviews.title: PURPLE NOT BLUE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The one I received had a purple face not dark blue like the description pic and the review photos. What sold me was the blue and it’s my husbands favorite color !! Could not gift him a purple watch..looked very feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz D.

customer_reviews.title: I highy recommend this classy watch.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very stylish and feels good on hand. It might be a bit heavy for some people but personally I love the weight. The golden color of the chain is amazing. It makes the watch looks so classy in combination with the purple color of the watch itself. The date and time is easy to modify and the watch functions amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Dkhati

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmmp
customer_reviews.text: First this watch weighs a ton the buttons (dials) on the side of the watch does nothing the hands don’t move turn or anything when you press them epic fail who knows if this is an actual Michael Kors product or not 😒it’s fashionable none the less but that is all ( beware)
customer_reviews.author: Bree Bree

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift. I realize it would be big, but I didn't realize it would be that big. It's an oversized watch. Having said that, it has a clean elegant look. Very good looking watch and people will definitely glance at it when you wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Alucard

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is GORGEOUS!! I have a small wrist but the large face on this watch is definitely a statement piece!! I did have to take it to the MK store to have links removed for the perfect fit but that was easy breezy. It is a bit heavy at first but you will get use to it. I've gotten so many compliments! Very good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this watch because I love the Michael Kors Bradshaw style. I have this watch is Black, Gold and Silver. The watch is Perfection and the seller of this watch is 100% reliable to buy from. The watch was wrapped in clear plastic the way to know is is brand new, in the MK box, tagged with the booklet inside the box. If I ever I have to look for this watch again I will look for the same seller!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa McNaughton

customer_reviews.title: my new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Clean, simple design. Better looking in real life. An understated statement piece. As I have fairly small wrists, was concerned that the face would be too large, but surprisingly, it doesn't overwhelm. For reference, previous watch was a 38 mm MK, which I still really like, but now I much prefer this 44 mm size. It definitely has a bit of heft to it; I don't mind the weight at all, but it would likely be bothersome to anyone looking for a weightless/lightweight experience.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer17

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Authentic product as well. I own another watch by MK that I bought for double the price but this one is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Shakia

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this watch
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this particular watch for many months. I have been watching it on Shopstyle.com until it gave me an alert that it was reduced in price. I LOVE this watch! Its a big faced watch and has some "weight" to it. Its too big for a petite woman, but it is quite stunning. I have received compliments on it every time I have worn it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-MarieTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this watch was guaranteed it was authentic spending money for an authentic watch and came out to be very cheap started t
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this watch was guaranteed it was authentic spending money for an authentic watch and came out to be very cheap started turning colors within a week don't like it at all not a very honest company
customer_reviews.author: G suarez

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it! He's had it for a few months now and it looks really sharp when he has on his button up shirts. Just enough bling without being too "much."
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He loves it. Replaced his bulova as his every day watch. His friend bought same one. Michael kors watch is made by fossil, so getting a fossil time piece basically in a Michael kors skin. But my boy likes the branding, so I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDIE

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and it does not work, the battery is dead and the item is garbage, avoid buying watches on Amazon. This is the last tom I bought anything here, I will cancel my membership, on top of that their delivery personnel drops my packages anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to give this to my dad for Christmas because I thought he wouldn't able to fit it around his wrist because his hands are so huge but it fit like a glove and he loved it. It looked icy on his wrist
customer_reviews.author: Tequila

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: A gorgeous watch. Large. I like the big "Boyfriend" type watches for women. This one is a tad bit heavy, but ....doesn't matter. Got used to it. I normally wear the white gold, stainless watches...wanted a gold watch and very happy for the looks of this one. A statement maker.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend as a birthday present. He loves it! There are two things that people should be aware of before you buy it. You can't really see the face of the watch since its so black (Not that my boyfriend cares, he just wanted it for the looks). Also, the dates are off when there are the 30/31 days in a month. So every other month your watch will be off by the one day. Not a huge negative, but would have been nice to know before the purchase. Other than that, he loves it and wears it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: mdas1231

customer_reviews.title: ... day I came across this watch I was in love. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Since the first day I came across this watch I was in love. Unfortunately, I did not have enough money to purchase it but I think that’s why it’s so special to me. I worked and saved up as much as I could and last year for Christmas I treated myself this watch. This Michael Kors watch is not too big nor too small, just the perfect size to show it off! This watch is heavy which makes it sturdy and well durable. You can wear any outfit with this watch and it always matches perfectly! Sort of a pricey product but well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! And yes it is real
customer_reviews.text: This watch is gorgeous I got it for my mans birthday! He loved it ! And yes it is real .
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! I just got it today, looks exactly the way it was described. It is a little heavy but I like that factor. It’s a very classic And sophisticated watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Louis

customer_reviews.title: The perfect black watch.
customer_reviews.text: First off the price for this watch is simply UNBELIEVABLE. This watch is amazing. It's professional sleek but yet it can shine. It's the perfect blend with chrome time indicators and being all black. I love this watch to death and I get compliments VERY often while wearing it. You cannot go wrong for if you're looking for a black watch at the right price. Even at retail store price this watch is beyond words and very comfortable I might add. Great watch I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Walker

customer_reviews.title: It is bigger than I thought. Originally, as ...
customer_reviews.text: It is bigger than I thought. Originally, as a woman's watch, my friends questioned if it is a man's watch. I have grown to accept it and wear it everyday. People are impressed by it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra D.

customer_reviews.title: If you have fists as large as mine being an ex-boxer, the watch bracelet cannot get past mine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Men's watch but apparently the order was changed to Women's. Bracelet is too small, will have to go to a shop to get a couple more links added. If your first is more than 4 inches wide the watch will not fit past your closed palm. Other than that the watch looks great has a great weight and stylish look.
customer_reviews.author: Raph Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Big watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very big heavy watch. The weight was such a problem I couldn’t wear it for quite some time after shoulder surgery. I love the face and it is easy to read. The watch band is wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jifo

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to ware & I’m a female. It is the same size as other MK watches I have bought & I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley K.

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Returning watch because it’s huge. Looks like a mans watch. It’s pretty tho, just too big for a lady unless you are 7’ tall.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn MK watches a s my mom loves them so I got her this one for her 70th birthday as a gift. She was excited. Beautiful and strong watch..it is a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vercee

customer_reviews.title: Best watch ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, fits my wrist perfectly most women’s watches run small and strangle my wrist as I’m 6ft tall I have a larger than normal wrist, made well and is beautiful against my olive skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Michelle O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Clearly Purple Dial NOT blue!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the color of the watch. I read the reviews claiming the watch was purple but the description and picture said Blue. I went for it and of course it it purple. No question about it. It is purple. Most likely returning as I wanted a navy blue dial. I’ll be calling amazon to see if there was an error. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Maria M

customer_reviews.title: Love me some MK
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 MK watches, this one is my favorite. Been looking for a all rose gold, simple face with roman numerals for awhile but couldn't find one I actually like. I wear this to interviews with suits and to the movies in sweat pants and a tshirt with Jordans lol. I love it you can wear with anything anywhere. Good quality watch.
customer_reviews.author: Emo

customer_reviews.title: so other than those couple things it is a great watch.
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves the watch. It wasn't the royal blue face she wanted, it was more navy blue, so most of the reviews are accurate. The only issue is, it is much heavier than most of the Michael Kors watches she has had. It has a lot of length to it, it actually fit my wrist perfectly, so other than those couple things it is a great watch.
customer_reviews.author: SMHII

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFULL
customer_reviews.text: This watch is absolutely beautiful, BUT I had to return it because it was just a little too snug around the wrist. Now my wrists are not tiny but not that big either, it will be a nice fit for the average size wrist I'm sure. I would definately reccomend it as it was a very sharp and sexy watch.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: GIGANTIC
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I love the color. But it is GIGANTIC. I can’t believe it’s even considered a women’s watch. It would be large on a medium sized man. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: tarajean

customer_reviews.title: Just gorgeous and flashy
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It’s beautiful and worth the purchase. It’s also authentic with the Michael Kors inserts and original tags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: HE LOVED IT! Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! Brought this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it, it's completely black so it's great for someone looking for an over all black watch. It's shiny and big. Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.author: Joli

customer_reviews.title: Too small for men!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband and it’s really too small for men. Maybe if it was for me. I returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Pachoue

customer_reviews.title: I got my money's worth
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It is functional, fashionable and does everything that it is supposed to. Thank you for this timeless beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Sara G

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful watch was purchased for my daughter, if you love big beautiful watches, you will love this, it really all depends on what kind of watch you like overall, to me, its a unisex watch, it has a little bit of weight to it, just to let you know, its VERY elegant, stylish and durable! She LOVES it, shipping was fast and the packaging was professional! Also, it looks the same as pictured and that's the biggest plus. Thank you Amazon and thank you Michael Kors!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: I do like a big watch
customer_reviews.text: I do like a big watch, but this was even bigger then I expected. Overall I love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. I ordered this two tone Blue faced MK watch (which shows up as men’s and is actually women’s but people say unisex). This is purple, not blue AT ALL! All the reviews on here show customers wearing the watch and it shows it a masculine dark blue. This is electric purple. I really want the blue one as it’s for Valentine’s Day for my boyfriend but now I’m afraid to order again. Getting a refund in 3-5 business days such a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Happy hubby
customer_reviews.text: hubby loves it, doesn’t even want to wear it, 😁😁 , as long as he’s happy so am i , thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Adella

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Had watch for a year now, nice and heavy. Wear it daily, apart for a few scratches on the glass, and that's down to me wearing it while running service calls. Watch has been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking watch, however it's much smaller than described and measured. Overall it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! It is a little big. I’ll have to get a few links removed, and I already have a pretty thick wrist for a woman.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! Big face and sturdy links. A littke too big but no biggie. It is heavy. Came in a MK watch box.
customer_reviews.author: RLS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, but too big for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I had been eyeing it forever but didn't really want to pay full retail ($250). Once I saw it discount on amazon. I had to get it. Since it is a unisex watch the face it really large ( too big for my wrist) and it was really heavy. The watch is beautifully made and well worth the price but I decided to return it because it was simply just too big. After returning it I immediately purchase the "mini" version from Macy's and wear it everyday. THIS IS A WONDERFUL WATCH !
customer_reviews.author: F. Williams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! I was having a hard time deciding ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I was having a hard time deciding between gold and rose gold....and this is the best of both worlds! It is heavy but I like that. It's a solid, classy watch. It does need to be sized but a MK or Fossil store will get that job done for free! I can't wait to wear this watch! May buy one in silver :)
customer_reviews.author: B&C

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch. I wear 5x weekly to work. It is heavy but it didn't take long to get used to. I work on my computer at my desk a lot and have put a pad of paper under my wrist so my watch doesn't rub on my desk. With anything, if you constantly rub it in the same place the finish will wear but I am not having that problem at this time. I've had the watch about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my fiance for his Christmas gift and he absolutely loved it. He collects watches and he didn't want to take this off his wrist. He loved the face and the fact that it provides the date. Definately a great watch to buy.
customer_reviews.author: MsKrayola

customer_reviews.title: Pretty arrived quickly but chips too easy
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty but chips to easily. Won’t be wearing it too often just nice to have in my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Man sized
customer_reviews.text: This watch is huge and heavy. I adore the color but returned it for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Authenticate First

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to loving Gold. I won't lie this made it very easy. Makes me want a few more like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholscl

customer_reviews.title: My Fiance Loved It
customer_reviews.text: * I bought the MEN'S WATCH...IDK why this says womens? ..weird ???? ANYWHOOOO.... The watch arrived just in time for my fiance's birthday! I was so excited and it was beautifully packaged and delivered. It looked even better than the picture. He Loves It! It's a beautiful piece of craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Little_Bird

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my niece’s graduation and she was so flattered and amazed by wearing such a gorgeous watch. I definitely recommend it any female lady!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his watch. He had 2 very expensive Invicta’s, but he wears this one the most.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ardoin

customer_reviews.title: It's different looking and that's why I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch...it's so different and unique. I fell in love with it immediately. I've had friends tell me it's sort of masculine, however, I find it just unique. With the right outfit it looks very sleek. It's definitely not your everyday run of the mill silver or gold MK watch. The dial is a little hard to read but not enough not to be able to tell time. It's a bit heavy but it doesn't bother me - it feels very solid.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Love the it just want I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. Just like the picture . I love the size of it and the colors are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Even though it's a woman watch you can't tell right ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's a woman watch you can't tell right off my son using it for prom he likes it
customer_reviews.author: Sky blues

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful- had to exchange as inital clasp was mediocre. I can imagine that is the first thing to go with this watch. But absolutely gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: KAB

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an oversized look! I love it. Heavy, expensive feel. It was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bystrack

customer_reviews.title: Fashion watch beware
customer_reviews.text: It's a fashion watch, you can get a better timepiece from Seiko. Nonetheless, it looks great, timekeeping is ok. Would recommend to someone who's more for impressing people than for actual collectors
customer_reviews.author: Jean G.

customer_reviews.title: Michael Kors Women's Bradshaw Gold Tone watch.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice large face women's watch runs large you may have to remove a link or two. I have received many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Elegant watch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my cousin. He loves this style. However, it is a bit tight on his wrist.
customer_reviews.author: mhjsachin

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite watch - makes quite a statement! You would be hard-pressed to find a better deal elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: It Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I own 2 other MK watches and purchased them directly from their website, so I was a little apprehensive about ordering one that was cheaper.. But I am very happy with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Angela (AJ) Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my 24 yr. old son. he loved it! very sharp looking
customer_reviews.author: footballfan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable yet very good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband had purchased the gold MK watch from “one more time.” He purchased it for $250 and it was the exact same thing as amazon. I love it and it’s at much affordable price. It fits my husband just right. He does need to get it resized just a little but there is enough for someone with a bigger or thicker wrist. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Diaz

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch.. A bit heavy but so beautiful. The brown looks great with every outfit. Very happy I decided on this style and color. Not the same old rose gold everyone is wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Dobin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my fiance to wear on our wedding day and it came fast and looked amazing ! A little too big but easily had a link taken out. It is perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Covington

customer_reviews.title: The watch itself is beautiful but no extra links were sent with it
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is beautiful but no extra links were sent with it, the size is extremely small and now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Bradshaw Stainless Steel 43MM Chronograph Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Elevate your style and take that look to the next level when wearing this Michael Kors™ timepiece.
 * Black stainless steel case and band.
 * Push button, fold out closure.
 * Luminous three-hand analog display with quartz movement.
 * Black dial with black hour markers, three sub-dials and date display window.
 * Dial ring features minute track.
 * Water resistant 5 ATM/50 meters.
 * GIft box included.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 40 mm
    *  Case Width: 40 mm
    *  Case Depth: 13 mm
    *  Band Width: 20 1⁄3 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 8 in
    *  Weight: 6.2 oz

feature_bullets: Round watch in silver and gold-tone featuring blue sunray dial with Roman numerals indices, date window, and three chronograph subdials
43 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Quartz movement with analog display; Crystal: Scratch Resistant Mineral
Three-link stainless steel band featuring gold-tone center links and fold-over clasp with double push-button safety
Water resistant to 100m (330ft): in general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not diving
